title: (x) Phantom of the Opera cracked glass logo - Times {Lex}
content:
Hi all,  
I am looking for the typeface used in the Phantom of the Opera “cracked glass” logo. I think it is some version of times but I am not sure. Thanks in advance!

Here is a good sized version of it for reference.  
 [http://www.thephantomoftheopera.com/poto/sights/sites\_wallpapers\_logo\_1024.php](http://web.archive.org/web/20080626202224/http:/www.thephantomoftheopera.com/poto/sights/sites_wallpapers_logo_1024.php)

 [‹ (x) Looking for font similar to Masters Tournament logo - Bookman Swash {Linda}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080626202224/http:/www.typophile.com/node/35248 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Italic serif face similar to Dolly - TEFF Collis {Ties, Jan E} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080626202224/http:/www.typophile.com/node/34906 "Go to next forum topic")
author: marcuspolino

comments.content:
Looks like Times to me, possibly squooshed a little.

- Lex
